item.title: 10 月份美国制造业进一步萎缩；供应商交货时间延长
item.description: 10 月份，美国制造业连续第八个月萎缩，原因是新订单依然低迷，在进口商品关税的背景下，供应商向工厂交付材料的时间延长。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted for an eighth straight month in October as new orders remained subdued, and suppliers were taking longer to deliver materials to factories against the backdrop of tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: MongoDB 聘用 Cloudflare 高管 Chirantan Desai 担任首席执行官
item.description: 数据库软件公司 MongoDB 周一任命 Cloudflare 产品和工程主管 Chirantan Desai 为新任首席执行官，11 月 10 日生效。【原文：Database software firm MongoDB on Monday named Chirantan Desai, Cloudflare's product and engineering head, as its new chief executive officer, effective November 10.】

item.title: 美国债务发行无意外：国债上涨，债券稳定
item.description: 人们普遍预计，美国财政部将在本周宣布，至少在未来 12 个月内保持票据和债券拍卖规模不变，因为财政部可能会继续发行更多的票据和短期债券，以管理可观的财政赤字。【原文：The U.S. Treasury is widely expected this week to announce its intention to keep note and bond auction sizes unchanged over the next 12 months, at least, as it likely continues to issue more bills and shorter-term debt to manage a sizable fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Onsemi 因人工智能需求驱动季度业绩超预期
item.description: 本周一，受人工智能热潮推动，数据中心对其芯片的需求大增，Onsmi 第三季度营收和利润均超出华尔街预期。【原文：Onsemi beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Monday, helped by an artificial intelligence boom that has boosted demand for its chips used in data centers.】

item.title: Pagaya 与 Castlelake 就高达 5 亿美元的汽车贷款达成协议
item.description: 借贷平台 Pagaya Technologies 周一宣布，同意将其最多 5 亿美元的汽车贷款出售给以资产为基础的私人信贷管理公司 Castlelake。【原文：Lending platform Pagaya Technologies on Monday announced an agreement to sell up to $500 million of its auto loans to asset-based private credit manager Castlelake.】

item.title: OpenAI 与亚马逊达成价值 380 亿美元的协议，让 ChatGPT 制造商使用 AWS
item.description: 根据一项价值 380 亿美元的多年期协议，亚马逊公司将为 OpenAI 提供云计算服务，使这家 ChatGPT 制造商能够使用数十万台英伟达图形处理器来训练和运行其人工智能模型。【原文：Amazon.com will supply OpenAI with cloud computing services under a multi-year $38 billion deal, giving the ChatGPT maker access to hundreds of thousands of Nvidia graphics processors to train and run its artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 在大屠杀中遇难的 600 万犹太人中有 500 万人的姓名现已查明
item.description: 以色列研究人员周一表示，在大屠杀中遇害的六百多万犹太人中，有五百万人的身份已被确认，而在人工智能（AI）的进一步帮助下，还可以找回更多的名字。【原文：Five million of the more than six million Jews killed in the Holocaust have now been identified, and with the further help of artificial intelligence (AI), even more names could be recovered, Israeli researchers said on Monday.】

item.title: 思科推出本地化计算设备来处理人工智能工作流程
item.description: 思科系统公司周一推出了一款计算设备，将在零售店、工厂车间和医疗机构等本地实体运行人工智能工作负载，加快其人工智能数据处理能力。【原文：Cisco Systems launched a computing device on Monday that will run artificial intelligence workloads at local entities such as retail stores, factory floors and healthcare facilities, speeding up their AI data processing capabilities.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，对冲基金千禧年向特定投资者出售 15%的股份
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引一封发给员工的电子邮件报道称，千禧管理公司已将 15%的股份出售给一个包括其最大机构投资者在内的集团。【原文：Millennium Management has sold a 15% stake to a group that included some of its largest institutional investors, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing an email to staff.】

item.title: 达菲说，如果他认为美国领空不安全，他将关闭美国领空
item.description: 美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周一表示，如果特朗普政府认为持续的政府停摆导致旅行风险过高，他将关闭美国航空系统。【原文：Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said Monday the Trump administration would shutter the U.S. aviation system if he thought an ongoing government shutdown was making it too risky to travel.】

item.title: 美国政府关门：美国政府关门：如何影响关键经济数据的发布
item.description: 由于共和党和民主党未能达成协议，将拨款延长至 9 月 30 日联邦财政年度结束之后，美国政府于 10 月 1 日关闭了大部分业务。【原文：The U.S. government shut down much of its operations on October 1 after Republicans and Democrats failed to reach an agreement to extend funding past the end of the federal fiscal year on September 30.】

item.title: 礼来耗资 30 亿美元在荷兰建厂提高减肥药产量
item.description: 近几个月来，这家美国制药商已斥资数十亿美元，用于提高orforglipron的产量。【原文：The US drugmaker has shelled out billions of dollars in recent months to boost production of orforglipron.】

item.title: Vertiv 将以约 10 亿美元收购 PurgeRite，以增强其液体冷却产品组合
item.description: Vertiv Holdings 公司周一表示，将以约 10 亿美元的价格收购暖通空调服务公司 PurgeRite Intermediate，这家数据中心电源设备制造商正努力扩大其液体冷却服务产品组合。【原文：Vertiv Holdings on Monday said it would acquire HVAC services firm PurgeRite Intermediate for about $1 billion, as the data center power equipment maker seeks to expand its liquid cooling services portfolio.】

item.title: 金佰利公司斥资 487 亿美元收购泰诺制药公司 Kenvue，但销售额未达预期
item.description: 本周一，Kenvue 第三季度销售额未达华尔街预期，同时它还宣布被金佰利公司以约 487 亿美元的价格收购。【原文：Kenvue missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter sales on Monday, while it also announced its acquisition by Kimberly-Clark for about $48.7 billion.】

item.title: 雪佛龙任命阿米特-加伊（Amit Ghai）为新财务总监
item.description: 石油和天然气巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周一表示，阿米特-加伊（Amit Ghai）将从 2026 年 3 月 1 日起担任公司财务总监。他将接替在公司工作 38 年后退休的 Alana Knowles。【原文：Oil and gas major Chevron said on Monday Amit Ghai will be its controller from March 1, 2026. He will succeed Alana Knowles, who will retire after 38 years with the company.】

item.title: 辉瑞对美塞拉和诺和诺德提起第二起诉讼
item.description: 辉瑞公司周一表示，已在特拉华州联邦法院对其控股股东美塞拉公司和诺和诺德公司提起第二起诉讼，指控它们的反竞争行为。【原文：Pfizer Inc said on Monday it has filed a second lawsuit against its controlling shareholder, Metsera , and Novo Nordisk in a Delaware federal court, accusing them of anticompetitive conduct.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰：不能从繁荣的金融市场判断货币政策立场
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，在评估货币政策时过分强调股票和企业信贷市场的强势是错误的，他认为货币政策仍然过于严格，正在加剧经济下滑的风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said it is wrong to put too much emphasis on the strength of equity and corporate credit markets in assessing monetary policy that he feels remains too restrictive and is heightening the risk of a downturn.】

item.title: 西班牙黑橄榄出口商敦促欧盟反击美国关税
item.description: 西班牙黑橄榄出口商呼吁欧盟利用世界贸易组织上周授权的权力，对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收的高额关税进行反击。【原文：Spanish black olive exporters have called on the EU to hit back at steep tariffs imposed under U.S. President Donald Trump, using powers authorised last week by the World Trade Organization.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔任命内部人士吉姆-柯里尔为航空航天部门首席执行官
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周一任命吉姆-柯里尔（Jim Currier）为其航空航天部门总裁兼首席执行官。【原文：Honeywell on Monday named Jim Currier as president and CEO of its aerospace unit, which will become an independent publicly traded company following its planned spinoff.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因人工智能乐观情绪和中美贸易休战而上涨
item.description: 受对人工智能需求和中美贸易休战的乐观预期影响，华尔街期货周一上涨，为 11 月份拉开了帷幕。【原文：Wall Street futures gained on Monday, kicking off November on firmer ground, on the back of optimism around AI demand and a U.S.-China trade truce.】

item.title: 工会称德国采埃孚计划因芯片短缺而裁员
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商采埃孚（ZFF.UL）的一名工会代表称，由于半导体供应有限，该公司正计划解雇施韦因富特工厂的工人。【原文：German auto parts supplier ZF (ZFF.UL) is planning to furlough workers at its Schweinfurt site due to a limited supply of semiconductors, a union representative said.】

item.title: 微软将在阿联酋投资超过 150 亿美元，并获得美国人工智能芯片出口许可证
item.description: 微软公司周一表示，计划在到 2029 年底的七年内向阿联酋投资超过 150 亿美元，并已从特朗普政府获得向这个海湾国家运送先进芯片的出口许可证。【原文：Microsoft plans to invest over $15 billion in the United Arab Emirates in the seven years to the end of 2029 and has secured export licenses from the Trump administration to ship advanced chips to the Gulf country, it said Monday.】

item.title: Xanadu Quantum 拟通过 36 亿美元 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: Xanadu Quantum Technologies 公司周一宣布，将通过与空白支票公司 Crane Harbor Acquisition Corp 合并，以 36 亿美元的价格在美国上市。【原文：Xanadu Quantum Technologies will go public in the United States through a merger with blank-check firm Crane Harbor Acquisition Corp in a $3.6 billion deal, the companies announced on Monday.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 将季度收益报告推迟至 11 月 11 日发布
item.description: Beyond Meat 周一表示，由于需要更多时间量化与部分资产相关的减值费用，该公司将把第三季度业绩报告推迟一周发布。【原文：Beyond Meat said on Monday it is delaying its third-quarter results report by a week as it requires more time to quantify an impairment charge related to some of its assets.】

item.title: 伊顿公司以 95 亿美元收购博伊德热力公司，加强数据中心业务部门
item.description: 伊顿公司将以 95 亿美元的价格从高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）手中收购博伊德公司（Boyd Corporation）的热能业务，这是这家电力管理公司今年的第四笔交易。【原文：Eaton will acquire Boyd Corporation's thermal business from Goldman Sachs Asset Management for $9.5 billion, the fourth deal this year for the power management firm that's seeking to bolster its data center segment to cater to AI demand surge.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司批准针对 1,100 名工人的裁员计划
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周一表示，其董事会已批准了一项新的自愿裁员计划，该计划针对约 1100 名员工。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras said on Monday that its board of directors has approved a new voluntary redundancy program targeting about 1,100 people.】

item.title: 特斯拉 10 月份在欧洲部分市场的销量再次下滑
item.description: 特斯拉 10 月份在挪威、瑞典和丹麦的销量大幅下滑，这是这家美国电动汽车制造商在欧洲继续挣扎的最新迹象，但该公司在法国的销量连续第二个月出现小幅增长。【原文：Tesla's sales plunged in October in Norway, Sweden and Denmark in the latest sign that the U.S. electric vehicle maker's European struggles continue, but the company posted a small gain in France for the second consecutive month.】

item.title: 英国监管机构将 Getty-Shutterstock 合并案提交深入调查
item.description: 英国竞争监督机构周一表示，将对美国盖蒂图片公司（Getty Images）与竞争对手快照公司（Shutterstock）之间的合并提议展开调查，因为两家公司提出的补救措施未能解决其担忧的问题。【原文：Britain's competition watchdog said on Monday it will launch an investigation into the proposed merger between U.S.-based Getty Images and rival Shutterstock after remedies offered by the companies failed to address its concerns.】

item.title: 金佰利公司将以 487 亿美元收购 Kenvue 公司
item.description: 金佰利公司（Kimberly-Clark）周一表示，将以现金加股票的方式收购泰诺（Tylenol）生产商肯维（Kenvue），交易价值约为 487 亿美元，从而成为美国最大的健康消费品公司之一。【原文：Kimberly-Clark said on Monday it will buy Tylenol maker Kenvue in a cash-and-stock deal valued at about $48.7 billion, to create one of the biggest consumer health goods companies in the United States.】

item.title: 早间竞价关税听证会前的 11 月提振
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】
